ygData.subject: Brian: Your help is needed for and SK related issue
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I can understand the non-SK related topics not being answered. That doesn t really bother me. Not all of my original thread was off topic. So, to repeat.
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I can understand the non-SK related topics not being
answered. That doesn't really bother me.
Not all of my original thread was off topic.
So, to repeat.
Why can't my Troll SK train with the Troll SK in the
Foriegn Quarter? There are several SKs there just
hanging out, yet none of them respond to anything.
Everyting else over there brings up a merchant window
when right-clicked on. The exception to this is the Ogre
guard and the NPC in the top room of the PVP arena. I
admit I have not tried anything with the Ogre inside the
building at the bottom of the first ramp. :P

BTW I love that message:
YOU have been slain by a Sand Gian
Pain and Suffering tries to strike you but misses...
LOADING PLEASE WAIT...
--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
15th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous





>From: "Brian Hook" <bhook@...>
>
>This is a Shadowknight mailing list. As such, I will stay involved
only
>with Shadowknight related topics. I am going to ignore general game
or
>non-SK related rants, since I've seen what can happen on other lists
(signal
>to noise plummets) when this occurs.
>
>Brian
>
